name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KushoAI: Auto-generate API Tests from Chrome Dev Tools

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly generate tests for APIs used by your web page (using the network tab data in dev tools) with this Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to use their API data from network tab of a web page to auto-generate tests using KushoAI
